"...Huh? Well, if it isn't <%me>.":
"What're you doing
all the way out here?"
"I'd ask you the same."
"I was heading for Lost Central."

"I'm doing some investigation
for my research."

"Oh, don't worry.
I wasn't going to Lost Central or anything."
"Ah, I see."

"I was just gathering some samples
in this area for my research."

"Though I do want to continue
investigating Lost Central."

"Meri and them kept saying
\"Don't you dare go in alone!\"."
"So, hey..."

"I just want to say...
Thanks for saving me back then."

"Amidst all the commotion,
I don't think I ever properly thanked you."

"Back then, I didn't think it would
become that big of an ordeal outside."

"Though communication was being jammed,
and there were a bunch of DOLLS nearby."

"I had prepared enough food, and there was
a mountain of data I wanted to look at."

"After being there a while, I figured I'd just
sneak out of there when I had the chance."

"I... guess I should've left someone a
message before I left, so that was my bad."
"When I was reading my Grandpa's reports in the lodge's study..."

"I found some documents
regarding the Central Cannon."

"I thought \"This is amazing!\", and before I knew
it, I was already headed to Lost Central."

"Once I get started on something, I have
this really bad habit of tunnel-vision."
"I've been trying to work on it."

"...But hey, I did manage to
improve the Central Cannon, right?"

"I could probably resume investigation into Lost Central...
Former Central City, and all that..."

"I think there could be some merit to it...
What do you say?"
"You've done more than enough."
"Absolutely not."
"Y-Yeah, I guess you're right."

"Sheesh, Meri would NOT let me
hear the end of it, though..."

"A-Ah...
You too, huh?"

"You know, when we got back to the lodge that day,
Meri really wouldn't let me hear the end of it..."

"Well, let's just say I now always make sure to
tell someone when I'm heading out somewhere."

"And when I'm gonna be late coming back,
I call ahead of time to let someone know."

"If possible, I also try not to
do everything by myself."

"I wasn't the only one who was like that, though.
Before, we all just kind of did our own thing."

"Lately though, I've noticed everyone's been
communicating and doing stuff together."

"It feels like, ever since that incident,
we've all changed quite a bit."
"Anyways!"

"From now on, I'll be contributing
to Aelio's efforts more than ever."

"I'll be helping with the Central Cannon,
and supporting various other projects."

"That's an endeavor that
I'm certain holds real merit."
"So, to reiterate..."
"Let's both do our best."
